thread.title: Kelardasht .. Main tourist attraction in Iran
thread.title_full: Kelardasht .. Main tourist attraction in Iran | MENAFN.COM

author: Kuwait News Agency (KUNA)
title: Kelardasht .. Main tourist attraction in Iran
text:
(MENAFN - Kuwait News Agency (KUNA) The Iranian city of Kelardasht in Mazandaran Province is one of the biggest tourist attractions in northern Iran, due to its unique nature.
The city, which dates back to 4,000 years ago, is situated at about 2,000 meters above sea level and includes streams and over 40 mountain tops. The summits are 4,000 meters above sea level and are covered with snow in winter time.
